channel.description: #three backtiks + tracker to create a tracker https://github.com/pyrochlore/obsidian-tracker/blob/master/examples/HabitTracker.md searchType: frontmatter searchTarget: noalcohol folder: personal/Journal/Daily datasetName: nonoalcohol fixedScale: 0.7 month: startWeekOn: 'Mon' color: steelbluesearchType: frontmatter searchTarget: nofap folder: personal/Journal/Daily datasetName: nofap summary: template: "Longest Streak: {{maxStreak()}} day(s)\nLongest Breaks: {{maxBreaks()}} day(s)\nLast streak: {{currentStreak()}} day(s)" searchType: frontmatter searchTarget: noalcohol folder: personal/Journal/Daily fixedScale: 1 datasetName: NoAlcohol fixedScale: .8 month: startWeekOn: ‘Mon’ color: orange summary: template: “Current Streak: {{currentStreak()}} day(s)”
